title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
macbook work but on battery magsafe not plug are always detected,  with magsafe plug battery charge no problem.
PPBUS_G3H 12,47v
CHGR_ACIN 3.95v
chgr_dcin 15.56
Resistance between pin 27/28 13,24 kohms, pin 17/18 : 6ohms of U7000

acok not pull down ?

how to work

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Resistance between pin 27/28 should de 20ohm, maybe broken trace or bad resistors R7021-R7022.....

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
i replaced R7021-R7022 resistance between pin27/28 and now 22ohms,

but always problem

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: I do not understand what you mean.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: on battery without magsafe power status : power adapter, how it's possible because magsafe unplugged

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: No Title

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
magsafe unplugged, on battery,
power source status  : power adapter

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Ah ok, I guess ACOK from ISL6259 stays high after disconnecting the adapter. Check for corrosion around ISL and clean it. Replace ISL if problem still there.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: i replaced it 3 times and still the same problem

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: it's possible problem with U6901 ?

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
No, u6901 is probably fine.
Measure ACOK from ISL when it is running on the battery.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: running on the battery ACOK 2,57v

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: What is resistance from ACOK to PP3V42? I still think it is bad ISL6259 it should be pulled low by that.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: 470ohm ACOK to PP3V42

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: That is very wrong. It could be U6901, remove it and check resistance again.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: removed U6901 and resistance ACOK to PP3V42 470K ohms

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: i replaced U6901 by other and ACOK to PP3v42 470K ohm

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
same problem
power source : power adapter (on battery magsafe unplugged)

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Replace 6259 again, it was probably killed by U6901.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: replaced new 6259 same problem

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Well, only things left are Q5310 and the SMC, take your pick.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Q5310 already replaced, before smc Q5300 possible ?

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
First check voltage on ACOK again when on battery? 
What would Q5300 have to do with ACOK, explain to me please.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message:
sorry acok not Q5300,

Thunderbolt port present but status not connected with minidisplay adapter to vga screen, this problem can not be with acok ?

i will change smc with donor board before testing thunderbolt circut

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Are we fixing ACOK issue or are we fixing thunderbolt now? Fix ACOK issue first. Thunderbolt has nothing to do with this.

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: yes fix ACOK before, i wait donor motherboard for replace smc

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: I replaced smc it works thanks duke solved new topic for display port doesn't work

title: Magsafe not plug but detected on battery 820-2936-A
message: Screw the display port. Too much shit can be wrong with that. If customer complains about it, swap the board with someone else that does not use display port.
